point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: good wax museum
review: museum is good situated in company garden. you can see many statuses of mahatma gandhi, lata and kishore kumar. but entry fee 100 rs. it is costly. not worth

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Wax museum
review: Yaa, it's nice. The statues made from wax looks almost real. But the entry fee is rs 100 per person. Too much for this place. There is also a selfie point there. Wax museum is situated in company garden only.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Ok one time visit
review: I have visited two wax museums 1 in Ooty which was great and second one in Delhi madam tusade. This was museum in mussoorie was ok. I didn't like it very much but I appreciate the hardwork of people. So if u haven't visited any wax museum before you can try this one.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Good wax nuseum
review: This is good wax museum in mussoorie. This museum is in comapny garden. There are very less wax statue.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Iconic
review: one of its kind, though our country has only a few wax museums but all are fantastic, place is popular and crowded

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Waste of money
review: I am sure much efforts must have gone in the statue creations but none did justice.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Made in India version of madam tussads
review: This wax museum is situated inside the company garden in mussoorie and on the first floor of food court.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: NEVER GO HERE
review: A wax museum that advertises itself with real photos of world leaders.. not their wax versions. Awful and unrealistic wax impressions. It took us about 3 minutes to exit in disgust. A complete waste of the Rs. 100/- per person.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: This is a must visit place when you visit the Company Garden in Mussoorie.
review: The wax museum is located inside the Company Garden. Rickshaw ride from Mall Road to reach Company Garden can be availed. This place is easily accessible from all parts of Mussoorie. This is a must visit place when you visit the Company Garden in Mussoorie. Situated inside the premises of Company Garden, the museum has an interesting collection of wax statues of Indian and international celebrities.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Good collection of wax statue
review: Good to see wax statue here in mussoorie. This museum is located inside the company garden and has separate ticket counter inside

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Average wax statues
review: This wax museum is situated inside the accompany Gardens and has separate entrance fee.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Nice
review: it is a nice place to visit with kids. They really enjoyed here.  It is just inside company garden only.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Live statues
review: Wax museum is in company garden around 5 km from Mall road. Entry fees is 100 rs. Museum contains lively statues of world famous personal such as Mahatma Gandhi Barak Obama, Michel Jackson etc.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Sometimes it is better to save money for future. ... I hope your guess is as good as mine
review: I have seen wax museums  at Lonawala and Mahabaleshwar too. I did not like this one. There were just about 15 wax statues. I did not like idea of having statues of Gandhi and Einstein being among Saddam Hussain and other not so famous or ill-famed persons. In addition to this, one would take up to three guesses to identify some of the so called dignitaries if there were no names displayed. I am sure if Mr. Obama and Lady Obama visit this place they will sue the owner.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: amazind
review: it is in company garden. kids like this place. but entry fee is high but you will enjoy if it is your first visit in wax museum

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Average Museum
review: You can combine this museum with Company Garden visit. My experience with this wax museum was average. There are few wax statues inside this museum.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: It is a mockery of the concept of Wax Museum
review: The men whose wax statues are made are far away from their real faces.The charge of Rs100/is a mere waste.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Wax statues are just average, not good
review: I visited Wax museum this month that is located in Company garden but unfortunately Wax statues does not looks real. Other decorative stuff there for taking selfies is good and we have taken most pics with those only. We hardly stay for 10 min there and Rs 100 per person is bit high for that much.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: In Company Garden
review: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum is in the company garden. The entry fee was 100 INR per person. The museum was average. There were few wax statues for renowned person such as Charlie Chaplin, Mr. Bean etc. Visit this museum if you have not seen any other wax museum.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Terrible - Avoidable - Not at all worth the high ticket charged - Rs 100.
review: Located within The Company Baug, this Wax Museum is simply terrible . Pl avoid. Do not waste the money. Not worth even Rs 10, forget Rs 100 entry tkt charged. None of the wax statues resemble the original personalities.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Not much to see
review: Just a couple of statues. not very well made and resemblance is extremely poor, except Mahatma Gandhi and Hitler. 10 mins max. Has a indoor fixed price shop.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Dont waste your time and money!!
review: - Ticket Rs 100/- per person.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Wax idols
review: Couple of Wax idols are kept, those who want to see first time, good to see. Entry fees applicable 100+

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: For those who never visited wax museums
review: Well for those who are visiting a wax museum for the first time might enjoy the work. Myself and my wife have seen class museums in London and Hongkong hence did not appreciate the finer finish of the statues. Well to us it was a loss of 200 bucks.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Ok to visit once
review: Around 25 statues are there, you will not be able to identify them without looking at the information plate.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Good Initiative
review: Its a good Museum but the ticket is costly. The decoration and room structure does not suitable for a wax Museum

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Expensive!
review: The attempt is good but entry ticket rate is exhorbitantly high Rs.100/- per head, which is a little bit too high compared to the content.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Good museum but should have more wax statues
review: Very few statues and thus one can have a quick 5-10 min walk inside, but not to expect much. Few statues are well made though.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Nice wax museum
review: Situated in the Company garden this is a good attraction for the kids. However the wax statues have little resemblance to the original characters and you have to read the plaque to make the connection.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Not worth visiting
review: No resemblance .... to the actual persons.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Very Nice
review: This museum is inside the company garden/municipal garden premises. Senior female members of my family visited the place and as per them they really enjoyed . Each and every wax statues looked very real and dynamic.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Average
review: They have a lot of statues.. like Mahatma Gandhi, JL Nehru, Mother Teresa, BR Ambedkar, Albert Einstein, Mr Bean, Charlie Chaplin, Vivekanand, Obamas, Princess Diana, Hitler, Pitbull, Michael Jackson .... They are average statues. Dimly lit museum. Photography is allowed but due to dim lights, photographs quality will get hampered. max 30 mins to spend in this museum.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Good museum
review: Felt like visiting Madame Tussards wax studio. Had statues of Mahatma Gandhi, Jawaharlal Nehru, Michael Jackson and many more..

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: The creativity of the artist is good but overpriced entry fees!!
review: This place is in the Company garden, so you do not have visit it separately somewhere. I liked the talent and creativity of the artist and is a good one time watch destination. The only drawback is that the entry fee is Rs.500/per person which does not justify to the majority of the crowd visiting here.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: A different experience
review: It was a very different experience. The wax statues were very real-like. A must-visit place. Although it is a bit far-away from mall road, and need a taxi to reach, but one should visit the place, if possible.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Only if you are desperate to guess who all are there!!
review: They have advertised so much!! You get intrigued. But once in, after buying a ticket of Rs.100 you realize that except a few (Mahatma Gandhi, Mother Teresa, etc.), You have to read who they are.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: excellent for the price of ticket charged
review: most of the statue are replica of original personality... can visit here if visiting company garden, nice for photography etc

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Wax statuea
review: I visited there thing madam tusandes museum, London. Lols its comparing white and black bt still nt bad either. However there were 26 statues and it ws 100 rs per head, tht shuld have been a Lil lessser.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Nice statues
review: Wax Museum, a not to miss place when you visit the Company Garden in Mussoorie. Nicestatues of wax are built here

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Quite average one
review: We visited company garden and was excited to see the Wax Museum. But its quite small and not wort visiting again.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: good place to visit in mussoorie
review: the K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum in mussoorie is definitely a must visit. The only negative point is the entry fee which is Rs. 100 per adult. I guess this might be one of the reasons why people don't come here often. Other than that its a beautiful museum with a wide range of collections.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Not worth going
review: High entry fee, vague resemblance of the exhibits with the real characters, could have been better...

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: All possible statues
review: This is a wax museum inside Company garden, You can bargain in entry tickets

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Wax idols at the Company Garden
review: This is the replica of Madam Tussats, London. Its a small museum, fully air conditioned, and the idols are not up to the mark and perfect measurements

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: One time visit is ok to know about the wax sculptor
review: Ticket is too costly as per the no of wax sculptors available. The rickshaws go there on to and fro basis, costs Rs 180 for two persons as per the rate chart, however negotiable upto Rs 150.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Overpriced and Dirty
review: Avoid . Priced at RS 100 per person , the place was dirty and wax job was shoddy . Visit only if you have not seen a wax statue earlier.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Nice to have a Wax museum in Mussoorie
review: Good to go with Kids for educative purposes but idols were not upto the mark. Parveen Babi, Angelina Jolie and President Obama were not 30% of the originals. MJ, Hitler, Einstein, Mother Teresa and Nehru were somewhat close. But it was a sheere surprise to see Wax museum in India that too in Mussoorie. Thumbs up for the try.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Poor resemblance
review: Most of the statues poorly resembled the people they were meant to copy. There were around 20 statues in a big hall. The fee is steep at hundred rupees per entry. Not much to do besides taking photos. Located in company garden.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Not recommended
review: My opinion is biased, having seen Madame Tussauds all over Europe.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Wax museum in Indai
review: Good to see wax museum in India and that too in mussoorie. most of wax statues are not resembled with original one. entry fee is high in comparison to reward.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Good for a short visit, it's inside the Company Garden campus!
review: It's not well publicized and hence people can miss it.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Museum
review: This is a good place to visit in mussoorie.

point_of_interest: K Dev Bhoomi Wax Museum Mussoorie
title: Entry fee is expensive but nice place
review: This place is in company garden and have very less crowd due to 2 reasons. One is this is in corner side so most the person can not seen it and other is the entry fee is INR 100 so most of the people do not want to pay. Otherwise this is the good place to visit specially with children and  family.
